text:
[Verse]
Steps on the pavement loud
Faces blur in the crowd
No map to guide us through
Just the beat we move to

[Verse 2]
Neon lights shine bright
Heartbeats sync with the night
No words just feel the sound
In this moment we are found

[Chorus]
Lost in the crowd
Dancing free and wild
Lost in the crowd
No worry no while

[Verse 3]
Under city skies so vast
We forget the past
Future doesn't matter now
Together we take a bow

[Bridge]
When the lights dim low
And the music slows
We hold on tight
Till the end of night

[Chorus]
Lost in the crowd
Dancing free and wild
Lost in the crowd
No worry no while
title: Lost in the Crowd
